## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install fast_melbo in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure fast_melbo package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to fast_melbo
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/z3research/fast_melbo):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/z3research/fast_melbo.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/z3research/fast_melbo)

``` sh
$ conda install -c z3research fast_melbo
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/fast_melbo/)

``` sh
$ pip install fast_melbo
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/z3research/fast_melbo)’s
[pages](https://z3research.github.io/fast_melbo/). Additionally you can
find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/z3research/fast_melbo) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/fast_melbo/) respectively.
